title: Boardwalk Queen
description: I was a good girl…. until I met the Boardwalk Kings.Dante, Nico, Angelo, and Stefan.Those ruthless men have tainted me with their blood-stained hands and forced me to live in the darkness with them.I’m no longer the rule-following perfectionist.And I don’t want to be that girl anymore.I have to prove my loyalty to the Kings.Show them I’m not like my thief father.And if I pass their tests, I will earn the right to be their queen.
author: Jillian Frost
